title: Dancer in the Dark [2000 PAL DVD][En Subs[En.Fi.No.Sv]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0168629/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0168629/</a>

7,9
		

A heart-rending, emotionally explosive musical from acclaimed director Lars von Trier. Selma (Bjork) is a Czech immigrant, working in a factory in Washington State. Not only is Selma struggling to make ends meet, she is also trying to save up for an operation to cure her young son of the genetic disease that is gradually blinding her. Her only joy is the role of Maria in a local production of The Sound of Music...

Winner of the 2000 Palme d'Or, 'Dancer in the Dark' is an outstanding example cinema's power to entertain, to move, and to shock.



Director Lars Von Trier
Certificate 15 years and over
Year 2000
Languages English + English for Visually impaired
Subtitles English Swedish Finnish Norwegian 
Duration 2 hours and 14 minutes (approx)
Region Region 2

Actors

Bjork, Catherine Deneuve, David Morse, Peter Stormare, Udo Kier, Joel Grey, Vincent Paterson, Cara Seymour, Jean-Marc Barr & Vladan Kostic
